   Darren Holland 
 (I) 
Camera Department   | 
Art Department 
Darren Holland is known for his work on  Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban  (2004),  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2  (2011) and  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire  (2005).
